The Banduhurang Mine is located 30 km west of Jadugora, India. Web search geocoded. Source: Calculated from Jaduguda (https://www.industrialinfo.com/news/article/indias-ongc-limited-discovers-uranium-deposits-during-oil-field-exploration-in-assam--152644). Banduhurang is India's first open-cut uranium mine, located near the Turamdih mine
